title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 19
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

Stage 19 was won from the breakaway and all of the main GC contenders finished safely in the front peloton, despite a fast start to the stage. Roglič remains in red heading in to stage 20.

1. Primož Roglič
2. Enric Mas +2:30
3. Miguel Angel Lopez +2:53
4. Jack Haig +4:36
5. Egan Bernal +4:43
6. Adam Yates +5:44
7. Sepp Kuss +6:02
8. Gino Mader +7:48
9. Guillaume Martin +8:31
10. Louis Meintjes +9:02

La Vuelta a Espana 2021: Route, Predictions and Contenders

Points Classification

1. Fabio Jakobsen - 250 points
2. Primož Roglič - 162 points
3. Magnus Cort - 144 points
4. Matteo Trentin - 132 points
5. Alberto Dainese - 120 points

La Vuelta Stage 20 Preview

King of the Mountains Classification

1. Michael Storer - 59 points
2. Romain Bardet - 54 points
3. Primož Roglič - 48 points
4. Damiano Caruso  - 33 points
5. Rafal Majka - 33 points

Young Rider's Classification

1. Egan Bernal
2. Gino Mäder +3:05
3. Juan Pedro Lopez +13:20
4. Remy Rochas +34:31
5. Clément Champoussin +47:32

Team Classification

1. Bahrain Victorious
2. Team Jumbo Visma +4:01
3. Ineos Grenadiers +15:22
4. Movistar Team +42:01
5. Intermarché - Wanty - Gobert Matériaux +47:23

author: Peter Stuart
